food_pantry.name: Pitchfork Pantry (ASU Food Pantry)
food_pantry.description: Provides free groceries and toiletries to ASU students who are experiencing food insecurity.
food_pantry.details: Open Monday and Wednesday 11 am–3 pm, Friday 11 am–3 pm at the Tempe campus. Bring your ASU ID and a reusable bag.

transport_pass.name: Valley Metro Student Pass
transport_pass.description: Discounted bus and light rail pass for ASU students.
transport_pass.details: Purchase through the ASU ID Card Office to get unlimited rides on Valley Metro buses and the light rail.

credit_union.name: Desert Financial Credit Union
credit_union.description: Offers high yield savings and student checking accounts.
credit_union.details: Visit the campus branch on University Drive or apply online. Special rates are available for students.

free_meals.name: Community Meals Program
free_meals.description: Student Success Center program offering free community meals.
free_meals.details: Check the Student Success Center calendar for upcoming community dinners with free meals and conversation.
